顊字的基本解释

顊
yí
古同“颐”：“白公胜虑乱，罢朝倒杖而策，锐贯顊。”

顊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》與之切，平之，以。］
“颐1”的繁体字。亦作“頉1”。亦作“頙2”。亦作“頥1”。亦作“顊1”。
(1)指口腔的下部。俗称下巴。
(2)保养。
(3)引申为宴享。
(4)《易》卦名。六十四卦之一。
(5)语助词。无义。
(6)通“弬”。

顊字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顊； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1406第25
【字彙補】余其切，音頤。【韓非子·喩老篇】白公勝慮亂，罷朝，倒杖而策，銳貫顊，血流至于地而不知。

顊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
顊字的起名意思

暂无。

Ruin
Basic explanation of words
Ruin
yí
Gu Tong's "Yi": "Bai Gong wins the chaos, and then tactics with the stick, sharply pierced."
Ruin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with it, flat it, with. ]
Traditional characters for "頤1". Also known as "頉1". Also known as "頙2". Also known as "頥1". Also known as "顊1".
(1) Refers to the lower part of the oral cavity. Commonly known as the chin.
(2) Maintenance.
(3) Extended to feast.
(4) The hexagram name of "Yi". One of the sixty-four hexagrams.
(5) Language auxiliary words. Meaningless.
(6) Through "弬".
Ruin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顊; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1406 Page 25
[Word Supplement] Yu Qiqie, Yinyi. [Han Feizi·Wu Lao Chapter] Bai Gong wins the troubles, stops the court, reverses the stick and tactics, and the blood flows to the ground without knowledge.
